The way I came up with its idea to film

articles I came across was "12 different

in Nepal . But also you you have this app
that is also very special and I

we would expect to do with Honeyguide is we

basically wanna create a platform, a
refuge so to speak from mountain lovers
to add people that people that depend upon the mountain,... mountain communities to come

together so that we can see for example,
like lodge owners, there are

the porters, there are trekking guides
that depend upon the mountain for

likelihood but then these people really
do not have direct market access and if
we connect the people who love the mountain, the trekkers the also socialize directly,

I think we're looking at a lot
of really amazing stories, amazing

experiences ...and some 
equitable distribution of income to all

these mountain communities too and that
is what Honeyguides is all about.
